B

BallController - Class in com.gdx.game.controller.entities
This class is used to control ball movements and status.
BallModel - Class in com.gdx.game.model.entities
This class represents the model for the ball
BallModel() - Constructor for class com.gdx.game.model.entities.BallModel
Creates a new BallModel with the stipulated default values.
BallModel(float, float, float, float) - Constructor for class com.gdx.game.model.entities.BallModel
Creates a new BallModel with the preferred x, y, z and d values.
BallView - Class in com.gdx.game.view.entities
This class is used to store a BodyInstance that represents the visual concept of the ball that we represent to play the game as the player.
BallView(float, Color, btCollisionShape, float) - Constructor for class com.gdx.game.view.entities.BallView
Creates a ball with a sphere BodyInstance with specified diameter, color, shape and mass.
BodyInstance - Class in com.gdx.game.utils
This class extends ModelInstance to allow the creation of objects that can be added to a btDynamicsWorld allows the use of the physics motor
BodyInstance(Model, String, btCollisionShape, float) - Constructor for class com.gdx.game.utils.BodyInstance
Creates a new BodyInstance with the preferred values.
BonusController - Class in com.gdx.game.controller.entities
This class is used to control bonus placement.
BonusController(BonusModel.BonusType) - Constructor for class com.gdx.game.controller.entities.BonusController
Creates a new bonus with said type.
BonusModel - Class in com.gdx.game.model.entities
This class represents the model for the bonus
BonusModel(BonusModel.BonusType) - Constructor for class com.gdx.game.model.entities.BonusModel
Creates a new BallModel with the stipulated default values and the preferred type.
BonusModel(float, float, float, float, BonusModel.BonusType) - Constructor for class com.gdx.game.model.entities.BonusModel
Creates a new BallModel with the preferred x, y, z, d and type values.
BonusModel.BonusType - Enum in com.gdx.game.model.entities
Possible BonusModel types
BonusView - Class in com.gdx.game.view.entities
This class is used to store a BodyInstance that represents the visual concept of the bonus that we represent to play the game as the bonus the player can catch.
BonusView(String, Color, float, btCollisionShape, float) - Constructor for class com.gdx.game.view.entities.BonusView
Creates a bonus with a sphere BodyInstance with specified diameter, color, shape and mass.
